<h1>$page.label</h1>

Welcome to the Home page of the <i class:"italic">$page.fields().spaceId().spaceLabel()</i> space.

The Documents & Pages area is organized into spaces (represented by folder icons in Navigation). Spaces in projects can contain LiveDoc Documents and Pages. In the Repository scope, spaces can contain only Pages.

Every space has its own Home page (accessed by clicking the space name). Each space also has an <a href="$page.getReference.spaceReference.createLink($transaction.context).index">Index page</a> where you can access the existing content of the space and create new content.

TIPS FOR GETTING STARTED 
You can change this content (and any other content on this Page) to make it into a useful Home page for the  $page.fields().spaceId().spaceLabel()  space. For example, you might want to write some documentation about the space and provide links to important content in the space.

Whenever you're ready to make changes, click Expand Tools (above) to expose the page toolbar. Then click the Edit button to open Page Editor. See Help on how to work with Pages.

To create new content in this space from this page, click: Expand Tools > Operations > Create New...
